Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing and can curse with Lycanthropy
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Shortsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Hand Crossbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 30/120ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Wererat makes 2 attacks, only one of which can be its Bite

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is Humanoid
Abilities.Ability 2: Keen Smell, The Wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
